#data import CSV

import data using reader package
```{r}
litters_df = read.csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")

head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
view(litters_df)
skimr::skim(litters_df)
read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c(".","NA"), skip = 2)
```
